highlights: Spearheaded performance engineering strategy by analyzing performance profiles, reducing network load size, and identifying key bottlenecks of core platform to **improve runtime performance by 95%**.
Led full-stack development for open source COVID-Net UI platform in React and Python to provide **AI screening and risk stratification of COVID-19** to 23 hospitals.
Improved COVID-Net platform stability and user experience by building notification system and error service to terminate dead backend plugins.
Engineered several application-level middleware for Express backend, handling input data sanitization & parameter validation and eliminating key vulnerabilities in web application.
Optimized end-to-end data flow, building cache services, creating database indices, and eliminating redundancies in object-relational mapping.

Developed a full-stack version management platform for Tensorflow networks and datasets using Angular, Express, and PostgreSQL that facilitates a more intuitive way to train neural networks, resulting in **15% less user downtime**.
Built internal data model parser using TypeScript Compiler API to increase visibility into product performance and to facilitate automation of unit tests, **saving 200+ hours of developer work**.
Engineered robust, self-repairing test suite API with Jest, generating **20x testing coverage**; published for use across engineering team.
Leveraged Angular's life-cycle hooks and response caching in frontend overhaul, leading to **20% reduction in inter-service latency and request runtime**.

Designed and implemented web-scraping robot workflows in Node to fetch financial documents and metadata from banks and vendors for **5000+ clients**, navigating websites with 2FA, ReCaptchas, bot detection, etc.
Constructed new platform on company intranet using Backbone and Express to facilitate & simplify internal beta-testing of existing features for production web app.
Enhanced robot-success data visualization by integrating new metrics & improving performance breakdowns using C3.js.

projects.title: PillBox
highlights: Won Astrazeneca challenge for **Best Digital Health Hack** with web-app controlled automatic IoT pill dispensary system.
Dashboard enables users and caregivers to setup dosage, schedule, and text alerts for easy management of medication.
Architected entirety of jQuery-driven frontend and designed RESTful API for Python Flask backend.

projects.title: TrashTag-It
highlights: Won **first place in MLH**'s Best Use of SnapKit SDK and Transposit Framework prize categories.
Developed Android app using Google Maps SDK to chart litter locations across local communities.
Built JavaScript API endpoints for location services and Python Flask web server.
